file_content.text: I must see to acquiring another team. I cannot expect you to continue to take their place.
The Exchange ammo dump is destroyed.
Yes. I have received numerous reports of the destruction of the Exchange's stockyards.
Including from an injured soldier who gave sole credit to you.
You have my thanks. Our hold on Tatooine will be more secure with the Exchange disarmed.
If you want to find any survivors, you'll need to work fast.
What are you saying? We lost a squad of very expensive Mandalorians and now our boys can't do the trick either? Forget excuses, work it out!
I'm sorry. That's hardly the image I wanted to present to a group of the Empire's finest.
I'm sorry, my lord. I should not have lost my temper in front of you.
That wasn't for outside ears.
The Exchange is proving to be more difficult than we originally estimated.
What are you saying?
Need some help?
I suppose it can't hurt to try one more time.
Can I help?
Your assistance may be our only hope, now.
The Exchange is nothing!
I never expected mere criminals could fight so skillfully.
The Exchange is using an old Reclamation base as an ammo stockyard.
We've taken two shots at it now, and we may have to cut our losses and retreat.
Let me handle it.
I appreciate your help, bounty hunter.
Leave it to me.
Your assistance will be most appreciated.
You're incompetent.
Does this mean you'll prove you can do better?
I will give you the location for the ammo stockyard we were targeting, plus the last known coordinates for our squad.
I suggest you look first for survivors. Perhaps they can give you some insight into why they failed.
Tough Luck. [Refuse quest]
Er... yes. I suspect you're right. Perhaps another mercenary group....
Why are so many people willing to fight over a ball of sand with nothing on it?
